results.name: Digits of one of the two 13-adic integers sqrt(-1) (digits 0, 1, ... , 9, 10, 11, 12 are used instead of 0, 1, ... , 9, A, B, C).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
xref: Digits of one of the two p-adic integers sqrt(-1): A210850 and A210851 (p=5), A286838 and this sequence (p=13).
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Aug 01 2017
